content: The condition is found in almost half of all heart attack cases and two-thirds of kidney failure cases. If not well controlled, diabetes can lead to serious complications or even life-threatening conditions.
contentPreview: The condition is found in almost half of all heart attack cases and two-thirds of kidney failure cases. If not well controlled, diabetes can lead to serious complications or even life-threatening conditions.
title: Diabetes is the second leading cause of mortality in Singapore.
